title: Taliyah doesn't appear on the launch screen[CLIENT]
body:
When I get to the launch screen for the game, before I log in, the free champion rotation doesn't show Taliyah, but it does bring up the information when I click on her.
1: Run League of Legends
2: Get to the launch screen
3:Look at the free champion rotation
4:See all of them but Taliyah
5: 100% of the time

replies.body: Thanks for the report! The team's aware of the issue. ^-^
